purpose: Golden Rule Test baseline - convert(model) inference MUST match these outputs

golden_outputs.prompt: Write a Python function to calculate factorial.

golden_outputs.expected_prefix: Recursion is a programming technique where a function calls itself

invariants.I-1_roundtrip: convert(gguf) → inference → output MUST match golden_outputs
invariants.I-2_tensor_names: all 339 tensor names accessible after conversion
invariants.I-3_no_fallback: unknown dtype/name → error, never silent default
invariants.I-5_tokenizer: encode(decode(tokens)) == tokens for all golden output tokens
